title: The 'ginger Penaud', a rivalry renewed & Genge's coffee - Prem talking points
subtitle: Ellis Genge's long-range score, George Hendy's hot streak and Saracens and Exeter renewing their rivalry feature in our Gallagher Prem round-up.
full_text: Ellis Genge's long-range score, George Hendy's hot streak and Saracens and Exeter renewing their rivalry feature in our Gallagher Prem round-up.
